attributes.action: removal of Labour MP David Lammy for refusing to acknowledge eu referendum
attributes.background: Labour MP David Lammy urges Parliament to ignore ‪#‎Brexit‬ vote: “The referendum was was an advisory, non-binding referendum and wants parliament to vote against the peoples will and ignore the referendum he forgets he was elected by the people to do their will and should be removed from office

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
